Uses of Class
rocks.bastion.core.json.JsonResponseAssertions

  • Packages that use JsonResponseAssertions 
    Package Description
    rocks.bastion.core.json  

    • Uses of JsonResponseAssertions in rocks.bastion.core.json

      Methods in rocks.bastion.core.json that return JsonResponseAssertions 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.fromResource(int expectedStatusCode, String expectedJsonSource)
      Creates a JsonResponseAssertions object which expects the specified response HTTP status code and JSON, which is loaded from the specified resource.
      static JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.fromString(int expectedStatusCode, String expectedJson)
      Creates a JsonResponseAssertions object which expects the specified response HTTP status code and the specified JSON.
      static JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.fromTemplate(int expectedStatusCode, String expectedJsonSource, Map<String,String> variableAssignments)
      Similar to the fromResource(int, String) method but also supports template variable assignments.
      JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.ignoreOrderForArrayProperties(String... fields)
      Ignore particular array fields' order in the actual response.
      JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.ignoreValuesForProperties(String... fields)
      Ignore particular fields' values in the actual JSON response.
      JsonResponseAssertions JsonResponseAssertions.overrideContentType(org.apache.http.entity.ContentType contentType)
      The assertions object will initially check that the content-type header returned by the actual response is "application/json".
